metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3757 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Moodle 2.0.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by webservice/xmlrpc/locallib.php and certain other files.

notes.Note: tyhicks> While Ubuntu repositories ship different major versions of moodle, some of the vulnerable source files listed are shared among releases.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
